review_data.title: Tiptop
review_data.content: Für den Zwischenhalt und kleine Snacks perfekt, Sushi-Qualität hervorragend und der Service sehr freundlich.More

review_data.title: My experience
review_data.content: The sushi is very good. A bit pricy but it‘s zurich... Because I‘m a younger client I didn‘t get the treatment I‘d deserve. The workers are inexperienced and incompetent.More

review_data.title: Modern and convenient
review_data.content: Just across the main train station, this place offers convenient japanese food in a clean environment. Selection of food is diverse and taste was good. Ideal for wat and go with friendly service from staff.

review_data.title: Japanese Restaurant with Delicacies
review_data.content: Yooji´s is a Japanese restaurant (room downstairs) and self-service bufé with seating places (on the street level) both with "moving table" and a la carte in the restaurant. All the Japanese specialities with noticable quality of dishes are available. Reszaurant is pleasant with friendly staff.

review_data.title: Sushi and noodle to go
review_data.content: Good noodle soup (fish, tofu, beef and chicken) during rush time. Sushi is quite cold and pricey. Staffs are friendly.

review_data.title: sushi to go OK, but to cold and to expensive
review_data.content: sushi to go OK, but to cold coming directly from refrigerated counter; quite expensive; friendly service, tea was good at a fair price

review_data.title: Ottima scelta
review_data.content: Ottima scelta di sushi, insalate e altre prelibatezze. Ad esempio ho molto apprezzato un insalata Poké, molto raffinata e saporita....More

review_data.title: Gutes Sushi für unterwegs

review_data.title: Quick Japanese fix at Zurich main station
review_data.content: If you're in need of a quick sushi, udon or other Japanese fix at the train station then this place will do. It's not great though. Staff was friendly and fast. Especially enjoyed the option to order on the tablet and receive a txt message...More

review_data.title: Good dinner place or take away

review_data.title: Very friendly staff who make you wanna come back!!

review_data.title: Sashimi top!
review_data.content: Finally i eat in Europe some top sashimi . Need to order there it melts in your mouth. And best Japanese Beer, forgot the name:) (silver can)

review_data.title: Delicious
review_data.content: Very close to the main train station. Easy japanese take away upstairs and restaurant downstairs. Delicious food and great choice. Nice atmosphere and friendly staff.

review_data.title: Great place to have a quick sushi bite
review_data.content: Located in the underground part of the main train station, Yooji's is a great place to pick up or eat a quick sushi bite, either in between travelling from A to B or on the way home for work. I've eaten there several times and...More

review_data.title: Good sushi
review_data.content: We ate upstairs, it's a take away but you can also eat in. The sushi was very nice, there was also a nice selection of deserts.

review_data.title: Быстро , вкусно , на вокзале .

review_data.title: Sushi on conveyer belt
review_data.content: The cool part is that you get to see what you're ordering. Not only that the tablet and magnetic scanner/sensor on each seat shows you the price and detail of each plate. Have fun with it. You can eat alone or order food not on...More

review_data.title: kaiten suhi at the bahnhof strasse
review_data.content: the take away is upstairs, the kaiten sushi is in the cellar. it sounds weird, but actually it s quite nice. Hightech ordering system over the indiviual ipad ;-) internet connection included ;-) sushi is good. quite full at lunch time!

review_data.title: Essen gut, Bedienung unfreundlich
review_data.content: Das Essen war gut, die Locaion auch. Die Bedienung war aber leider unfreundlich. Fazit: Okay, aber nicht mehr

review_data.title: Small fast food feel Sushi restaurant

review_data.title: Nice and stylish sushi restaurant!
review_data.content: It was my first visit at that place and I must say that the chicken rolls, the beef soup and fresh spearmint tea I had were fantastic! You can sit on the fancy bar they have and watch the cooks prepare the food and pick...More

review_data.title: Yooji's expands to Luzern
review_data.content: Yooji's operates sushi restaurants in Zurich and now Luzern. Some Yooji's locations are proper sit down restaurants complete with moving sushi bar (not unlike the UK chain Yo! Sushi) and others are mostly small takeaway places (not unlike Wasabi in London). This Yooji's is located...More

review_data.title: Yooji's
review_data.content: Yooji's operates sushi restaurants all over Switzerland and has numerous outlets in Zurich itself. This Yooji's opened in mid June 2014 along with many other new stores in the underground Zurich Hauptbahhof shopping area along with with the new platforms for tracks 31-34. This Yooji's...More
